name: Project name
webURL: Project web URL (if web is set to true)

name: ikeatoys
description:
A simple tracker that tracks stock for some IKEA toys via the official IKEA Malaysia website.

name: bus?
description: Experimental bus tracking app for rapidPenang, rapidKL and rapidPahang via Malaysia's Open Government API.

name: Leetvigator
description: React-based Leetcode browser by question number, with a dedicated button to select a random question.

name: covidcases
description: A simple, no-nonsense page that displays daily COVID-19 cases in Malaysia sourced from an API via the Malaysia Ministry of Health GitHub data. Also on Twitter/X and Mastodon.

name: Untitled Music Streaming Thing
description: A locally-hosted React web app that plays music from Spotify with a Spotify Premium account, as well as locally uploaded files - which saves user info via a local MongoDB database.

name: The weird world of Physical Home Entertainment
description: An interactive website about disc-based home entertainment in Malaysia, both 'pasar malam' and original ones, built with Bootstrap and GSAP. Part of a school project.
